name: Brandy Blocks
author: YayCommerce

sections.description:
Brandy Blocks extends the functionality of the Gutenberg editor by adding new amazing blocks.

You can use them to add as many predesigned patterns as you like.

LIST OF BLOCKS

  1. Testimonials: This block allows you to display a responsive testimonial slider on any page/post using Gutenberg. You can customize the slider to match your website’s design and choose from a variety of animation effects to make it more engaging.

  2. Pricing: This block lets you display a three-column pricing table with a highlighted plan. You can customize the columns to match your website’s design. These columns act as a comparison table, and you can add as many rows as you need to display your pricing options, features, perks, etc.

  3. Products with banners

  4. Relative posts

And many more!

HOW TO USE BRANDY BLOCKS

By default, each Brandy block provides individual options and premade styles. You can edit block content within each element. To set up the whole block or parent block options, be sure to look into the Block Settings sidebar.

1. USING TESTIMONIALS

From the block’s top left toolbar, you can either select parent block or individual block to find its respective settings.

  • Set the total of testimonials:

    • Once the whole parent block is selected, look for “Testimonial Count” to edit the number of items.
    • Change the order of testimonials by dragging and dropping each item in the block settings sidebar.

  • Parent block appearance:

    • Carousel: Enable autoplay, edit transition speed, and more.
    • Dimensions: Modify the spacing to fit your design needs.

  • Edit testimonial content in the nested blocks:

    • Customize rating and additional CSS
    • Edit name, title, avatar, and testimonial text.

2. USING PRICING BLOCK

There is a parent block, which contains the multi-column table layout, and the nested blocks.

  • Parent block appearance:

    • Design and edit heading, subheading, and description.
    • Adjust pricing card layout and style.
    • Typography, text color, background color, and custom formatting.
    • Enhance responsiveness by enabling stack on mobile.

  • Highlighted card:

    • Pick the pricing card to stand out and how you want to highlight it.
    • Tweak the color and format of the price display.

  • Pricing plans:

    • Each pricing card comes with customization options in the nested blocks.
    • Enhance the feature list with available/unavailable icons.
    • Fully edit all plan names, descriptions, and lists of features.

We hope that this plugin is useful in helping you create stunning sections and pages for your WordPress ecommerce website. If you have any questions or feedback, please don’t hesitate to chat with us.

FOR DEVELOPERS

For most basic WordPress block options, using the standard Brandy theme is recommended. However, if you want to make it work for other themes, advanced page builders, or test in troubleshooting scenarios, please check this git repo.

If you want to optimize production builds for better performance, note that we use Vite v4. Learn more on how to configure Vite here.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from wordpress.org
  2. From your WordPress admin dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New, and upload the plugin’s zip file
  3. Install and activate it
  4. After activating, you will see the new blocks under the “BRANDY” block group in the Gutenberg editor.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin GDPR-compliant?

A big yes, it is compliant with GDPR. It collects no sensitive information.

I have issues with the plugin. How can I get support?

Please create a topic in this plugin’s support forum or contact us to get help. To quickly get the answers, please attach screenshots of currently active WordPress plugins on your website.
sections.changelog:
Oct 18, 2024 – Version 1.0.5

  • Added: Add to wishlist block
  • Added: Countdown Block
  • Added: External settings: Hover color + border in Gutenberg Button block & WC Add To Cart block
  • Added: External settings: original typography + color for original price in WC Product Price block
  • Added: Testimonials block slide speed setting
  • Added: External settings: Block visible conditions (Example: Display Gutenberg block when user logged in/ in specific day in week/in any browser)
  • Updated: Add alpha color support in ColorPicker

Sep 7, 2024 – Version 1.0.4

  • Added: Blocks display animation setting
  • Added: Blocks responsive display condition setting
  • Added: Google map block
  • Added: Form Block

Aug 19, 2024 – Version 1.0.3

  • Added: Jump to Section block
  • Updated: Allow user to add/edit blocks to content template (Relative posts block)
  • Improved: Testimonial block styles

Aug 5, 2024 – Version 1.0.2

  • Fixed: Widget at header/footer (Brandy Blocks plugin is required if you want to edit the widgets at header/footer of the Brandy theme)

Apr 24, 2024 – Version 1.0.1

  • Added: Products with banners block
  • Added: Relative blogs block

Mar 29, 2024 – Version 1.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Create beautiful and responsive content for your WordPress website.
